turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there Joan. Can you order us some pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Where would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking Domino's because they have some great deals.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. So what are you in the mood for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well we want at least two large pizzas and we have to consider the kids as well so just make the first one a large Cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. One large Cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK you ready for the second pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You bet. Go ahead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK so I want one of their specialty pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well they have quite a few of them. Anything in particular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't know. My wife and I rarely want the exact same thing

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK so why don't you build your own and go half and half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. OK. That sounds really good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, now go ahead with your second pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So we want a large pizza. On one half we want ham and salami. Got that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the other half we want pepperoni and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and add a 2 liter of Sprite because the whole family likes that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it so let me see if we have it right: You want a large cheese pizza and another large pizza with ham and salami on one half and pepperoni and bacon on the other?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right and...

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you want a 2 liter of Sprite.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK give me a minute to put the order in... ok. I placed the order and they should be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a million.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
